minimum_req: Desktop computer (e.g. optimized for wider screens)
output_data_formats: Widely used file formats (CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)
name: AgroForstRechner
description: The Agroforst-Rechner (AF-R), which is freely available on the website of the German Association for Agroforestry (DeFAF), is a German tool based on MS Excel that can be used to quickly and flexibly compare and evaluate the management of woody plants on arable land and the conventional cultivation of arable crops from an economic perspective.  Regarding the potential uses of shrubs and trees, the sale of wood chips, logs, and the in-house energy utilisation of wood chips by combined heat and power (CHP) plants can be calculated. The economic evaluation is based on a calculation of extensive input parameters and expressed via a dynamic investment calculation using the economic key figures, net present value (NPV), and annuity.  An integrated database can be used for some input parameters, which provides the user with reference values.  These serve as an aid for an improved estimation of individual parameters, but can also be included directly in the calculation as reference values.
access_barrier: No, direct download/access through a web link
